## Test1: Multiline single core - with GC vs without GC
###   Observation: differences in lines 28 and 29 (expand and scroll right to view side-by-side)

#### load `diffr`
```{r}
library(diffr)
```

#### bind files to file1 and file2
```{r}
file1 <- "D:\\Midnite Mansion\\Documents\\R Projects\\functions\\multiline-sc-withgc.R"
file2 <- "D:\\Midnite Mansion\\Documents\\R Projects\\functions\\multiline-sc-withoutgc.R"
```

#### input function
```{r}
diffr(file1, file2, contextSize = 1, minJumpSize = 30, before = "multiline-sc-withgc", after = "multiline-sc-withoutgc")
```
